  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:bioo_es_20070518_2_0030812</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0030812</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Nutrición bacteriana</string>
            <string language="en">Bacterial nutrition</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bakterielle Nahrung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nutrition bactérienne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nutrition bacteriano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Nutrizione batterica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βακτηριακή διατροφή</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Clasifica a las bacterias, atendiendo al tipo de nutrición, en autótrofas y heterótrofas. También las clasifica atendiendo al lugar de vida y a las necesidades de oxígeno.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic classifying bacteria, according to the type of nutrition, in autotrophic or heterotrophic. It also classifies them according to where they live and their need of oxygen.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Nutrición bacteriana</string>
            <string language="en">Bacterial nutrition</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thema, das Bakterium, entsprechend dem Typen von 
Nahrung, in sich selbst ernährendem oder in heterotrophic einstuft. 
Sie stuft es auch entsprechend ein, wo sie und ihre 
Notwendigkeit des Sauerstoffes leben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sujet classifiant des bactéries, selon le type 
de nutrition, dans autotrophe ou hétérotrophe. Elle les 
classifie également selon où elles vivent et leur besoin de 
l'oxygène.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tópico que classifica as bactérias, de acordo 
com o tipo de nutrition, em autotrophic ou em heterotrophic. 
Classifica-os também de acordo com onde vivem e sua necessidade
do oxigênio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soggetto che classifica i batteri, secondo il 
tipo di nutrizione, in autotrofico o in heterotrophic. 
Egualmente lo classifica secondo dove vivono ed il loro bisogno 
di ossigeno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που ταξινομεί τα βακτηρίδια, σύμφωνα με τον τύπο
διατροφής, αυτότροφος ή ετεροτροπικός. Τους ταξινομεί 
επίσης σύμφωνα με όπου ζουν και η ανάγκη οξυγόνου τους.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bakterielle Nahrung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nutrition bactérienne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nutrition bacteriano</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">biosfera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Nutrizione batterica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βιόσφαιρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η βιολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βακτηριακή διατροφή</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
